nodes.text: Madam Synata's Genius of A Thousand Faces Museum
Madam Synata's Genius of A Thousand Faces Museum was the private museum of Madam Risha Synata on board her ship.

A museum of galactic history (albeit with disputed accuracy) existed aboard Risha Synata's ship. Named "Madam Synata's Genius of A Thousand Faces Museum," the showcase was acted out by replicas of the Frenk with other automatons, including depictions of senators Sheev Palpatine, Padmé Amidala, Jedi Bolla Ropal, Kit Fisto, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi and two members of Yoda's species. The museum also contained dioramas of the planets Ando Prime, Naboo, and Tatooine, a diner similar to Dexter Jettster's, and an Ewok village. A Varykino diorama was a work in process during the Clone Wars.

After the Senate Hostage crisis, Risha Synata, by the orchestration of Count Dooku, invited a number of senators unconvinced of joining the Confederacy of Independent Systems, including Padmé Amidala, to one of the famous parties she held on her starship. The actress intended to gas such guests in order to advance her goals of presenting history through her plays to Dooku's favor.

Padmé Amidala, alongside her entourage, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, eventually arrived at the venue, located at Caamas of the Cirius system at the time. During their visit, Madam Synata insisted that the duo conduct a private tour of the museum, and intended for Gastum to open the exhibition.
